Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 36th overall pick, by Boston in 2018...
Traded from Boston to St. Louis (B) on 3/2/2018 (Going to BOS: 2B Shuuichirou Toshitsugu. Going to SLB: RF Adam Malik)...
Injured on 5/21/2018 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/22/2018, off Columbus Willingham (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/11/2018, off Raymond Carollo (BOS)...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 8/11/2018...
Injured on 9/11/2018 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/4/2019 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
